## Subcategory

Which NIST AI RMF subcategory is affected? (e.g., GOVERN 1.1, MAP 2.3)

## Current Mapping

What field(s) currently map to this subcategory? (check `src/schema/nist-mapping.ts`)

## Suggested Change

What should change? Should fields be added, removed, or remapped?

## Justification

Reference the NIST AI 100-1 document or other authoritative source explaining why this mapping is more accurate.
